Managed services partners are jumping on board, though. A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program, says an article on MSPmentor.net, which tracks the managed services provider market. As Matt Duss pointed out last year, the RAND Corporation did a study concluding that Iraq's instability has become a convenient scarecrow neighboring regimes can use to delay political reform by asserting that democratization inevitably leads to insecurity. NBA.com staff reports-- Allen Iverson 's season is over. The Detroit Pistons said Friday the All-Star guard will miss the rest of the season-- and the playoffs if they make it-- because of a sore back. After talking with Allen Iverson and our medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time, Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team. Joe Donnelly in Northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said. "I think he'd clear the field." that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that! " "We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together," Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets" 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.
